thread.title: Ascott once again impresses
thread.title_full: Ascott once again impresses - Review of Citadines Place d'Italie Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: James O
title: Ascott once again impresses
text:
Despite not being in a tourist area, I had no problems going around as a tourist as the property is extremely conveniently located.
Staff were extremely friendly, rooms were very clean, easy access to many things include a mall next door and tube (metro) station literally in front of the property. Coffee machine and apple computers avail for use made it easy to go down and plan your itinerary while popping over to reception to get recommendations.
Front desk were once again very helpful and friendly, and I would stay here again.
I have been using Ascott properties for a while now and this property definitely lives up to their standards.
